title: The Bird That Drinks Tears - Novel Updates
author: Lee Young-do   이영도
description: In a world where four chosen races exist, the world is divided into two. One half is the jungle where the Nagas reside, and the rest is inhabited by the humans, Dokkaebis, and Leckorns. A party of three, consisting of a human, a Dokkaebi, and a Leckorn, infiltrates the territory of the Nagas to rescue a Naga.>
